articles.content: CHICAGO (WLS) -- The Quaker Oats Company have given Aunt Jemima a new name and new look, but the families of some of the women who portrayed her over the years feel they are being erased."It's a gros… [+1930 chars]

articles.author: Diana Olick
articles.title: Mortgage demand drops as interest rates hit a three-month high - CNBC
articles.description: Mortgage interest rates have increased in four of the first six weeks of 2021, putting a chill on mortgage demand.
articles.content:
Mortgage interest rates have increased in four of the first six weeks of 2021, putting a chill on mortgage demand.
